use_button.description: Press the button on the coffee machine.

clean_button.description: Clean the button to remove dust or any other particles.

use_lid.description: Press the lid to close or open it.

clean_lid.description: Clean the lid to remove coffee fragments.

clean_container.description: Clean the container to remove coffee fragments.

use_container.description: Press the container to empty used coffee.

rotate_lever.description: Rotate the lever to pour coffee.

clean_lever.description: Clean the lever to remove any residue from the coffee or milk.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob to choose different coffee brewing options.

clean_knob.description: Clean the knob to remove any residue from the coffee.

clean_coffee_machine_body.description: Clean the coffee machine body to keep it neat.

clean_whole_coffee_machine.description: Clean the entire coffee machine including the button, lid, container, lever, knob, and the coffee machine body.
